name: Equipboard Inc.
description: Operator of a content-driven listing platform designed to find, share and shop musical gear and instruments. The company's platform offers a crowdsourced database of artists and the gear they use for users to select celebrity-endorsed gears and buy them through e-commerce platforms, enabling customers to acquire desired equipment at affordable rates.
one_liner: Operator of a content-driven listing platform designed to find, share and shop musical gear and instruments. The company's platform offers a crowdsourced database of artists and the gear they use for users to select celebrity-endorsed gears and buy them through e-commerce platforms, enabling customers to acquire desired equipment at affordable rates.
